channel.title: Radiation Protection
channel.description: Updated Radiation Protection content from the US Environmental Protection Agency

item.title: Fact Sheet: 2017 Notice of Proposed Rulemaking
item.description:
This fact sheet provides information about the 2017 re-proposal of “Health and Environmental Protection Standards for Uranium and Thorium Mill Tailings” (40 CFR Part 192).

  • Fact Sheet: 2017 Notice of Proposed Rulemaking (PDF)(2 pp, 738 K)
    Fact Sheet about the 2017 Notice of Proposed Rulemaking for 40 CFR 192
item.dc:creator: ashogren

item.title: Text of upcoming Federal Register Notice for 40 CFR 192 NPRM
item.description:
Text of upcoming Federal Register Notice for 40 CFR 192 NPRM

  • Text of upcoming Federal Register Notice for 40 CFR 192 NPRM (PDF)(118 pp, 4 MB)
    This document is a prepublication version of an upcoming Federal Register Notice. This copy is being provided to inform the public about EPA’s intentions, and will be replaced with a link to the official final rule in the Federal Register.
item.dc:creator: mthorn02

item.title: Summary of Comments, ANPR for 40 CFR Part 190
item.description:
In 2014, the Agency collected public comment and information to support of its review of the standards in an Advance Notice of Public Rulemaking (ANPR). EPA did not propose any changes to the current standards in the ANPR. EPA is currently evaluating the comments and information received. After completing this evaluation, EPA may propose revised radiation protection standards or leave the existing ones in place. Any proposed revisions to the standards would be published in the Federal Register in a Notice of Proposed Rulemaking.

A summary of the comments is below: 

  • Summary of Comments, ANPR for 40 CFR Part 190 (PDF)(7 pp, 60 K)
    Summary of public comments received from ANPR for 40 CFR Part 190.
item.dc:creator: ashogren

item.title: Attachment B: Station B Stack COV Testing of IVS & SVS
